channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: UTMB has mandatory gear requirements. They check to make sure you are carrying this throughout the race. Race starts Friday. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #ultramarathon #runtok
item.description: UTMB has mandatory gear requirements. They check to make sure you are carrying this throughout the race. Race starts Friday. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #ultramarathon #runtok

item.title: Four days until UTMB. I'll be looking for this beautiful cow again. My favorite video from UTMB even though it has nothing to do with running. Hopefully, I won't be so out of my mind this time around. Should I pet her? Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ut
item.description: Four days until UTMB. I'll be looking for this beautiful cow again. My favorite video from UTMB even though it has nothing to do with running. Hopefully, I won't be so out of my mind this time around. Should I pet her? Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ut

item.title: Just me? Nothing like thinking you were dying of lead poisoning all week only to discover the patient portal linked the wrong description to the test you took. I know a heck of a lot about lead poisoning now. Definitely not something that you want to get.
item.description: Just me? Nothing like thinking you were dying of lead poisoning all week only to discover the patient portal linked the wrong description to the test you took. I know a heck of a lot about lead poisoning now. Definitely not something that you want to get.

item.title: UTMB 170km ultramarathon starts tonight at 6pm French time. (9am PST) Follow me as I run from France to Italy to Switzerland and back into France. It's going to be epic. Let's get ready to suffer. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #ultramarathon #Ul
item.description: UTMB 170km ultramarathon starts tonight at 6pm French time. (9am PST) Follow me as I run from France to Italy to Switzerland and back into France. It's going to be epic. Let's get ready to suffer. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #utmb #ultramarathon #Ul

item.title: UTMB was hard on my feet ##runtok #utmb

item.title: UTMB was super hard this year and I loved it. 5th time running it. it never gets easier, but it's always a dream. I think it's the hardest 100 miler out there. Smile,.or you're doing it wrong #utmb #runtok #Ultrarunner
item.description: UTMB was super hard this year and I loved it. 5th time running it. it never gets easier, but it's always a dream. I think it's the hardest 100 miler out there. Smile,.or you're doing it wrong #utmb #runtok #Ultrarunner

item.title: The shoes held up well. Despite the extremely rocky terrain at UTMB, all lugs survived. Just a little dirty. I'll still run another 300 training miles on them. But I need a new pair for Run Rabbit Run 100 in 12 days. These are Hoka Challengers 7s. No, I d
item.description: The shoes held up well. Despite the extremely rocky terrain at UTMB, all lugs survived. Just a little dirty. I'll still run another 300 training miles on them. But I need a new pair for Run Rabbit Run 100 in 12 days. These are Hoka Challengers 7s. No, I d

item.title: Failure is one of the greatest teachers we have. It‚Äôs easy to celebrate success, but it's in our failures where the real growth happens. Every setback is a chance to learn, adjust, and come back stronger. In running, and in life, you‚Äôre never truly defeat

item.title: Does anyone else get a little sad when they have to retire gear? This watch has been with me through some of the toughest races, covering thousands of miles in every type of weather. It‚Äôs seen mountain summits and been the first thing I check (and snap a

item.title: When you're married to an ultrarunner, things you might have to do will test that "for worse" statement. If anyone doubted how much my wife loves me, I have video proof. Kt tape is my duct tape, I use it for everything. Nipple chaffing, friction reduction
item.description: When you're married to an ultrarunner, things you might have to do will test that "for worse" statement. If anyone doubted how much my wife loves me, I have video proof. Kt tape is my duct tape, I use it for everything. Nipple chaffing, friction reduction

item.title: Your life is worth fighting for. Every single one of us has a purpose, even if it feels lost in the moment. If you‚Äôre struggling, please reach out. Whether it‚Äôs to a friend, a family member, or a professional, there‚Äôs no shame in asking for help. There ar

item.title: YMCA Stairclimb 2024. 3rd place firefighter. 8th place overall in the hero category. Wore all my gear and PR'd my time by 90 seconds. Finish time 22 minutes 02 seconds for 75 flights with 75 pounds of gear. I've been doing this climb since I was a probati
item.description: YMCA Stairclimb 2024. 3rd place firefighter. 8th place overall in the hero category. Wore all my gear and PR'd my time by 90 seconds. Finish time 22 minutes 02 seconds for 75 flights with 75 pounds of gear. I've been doing this climb since I was a probati

item.title: Moab 240 miler in 3 days. There's a lot of packing and planning involved when you have 12 dropbags. So scared. My body is in a taper tantrum. I've got to trust the process. Looking forward to seeing everyone out there. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #
item.description: Moab 240 miler in 3 days. There's a lot of packing and planning involved when you have 12 dropbags. So scared. My body is in a taper tantrum. I've got to trust the process. Looking forward to seeing everyone out there. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #

item.title: Running 240 miles solo and unsupported takes a lot of planning. I have to predict when I'll reach each aid station and what I‚Äôll need when I get there. Hitting an aid station at 10,000 feet at 2am is a completely different situation than arriving at 2pm.
item.description: Running 240 miles solo and unsupported takes a lot of planning. I have to predict when I'll reach each aid station and what I‚Äôll need when I get there. Hitting an aid station at 10,000 feet at 2am is a completely different situation than arriving at 2pm.

item.title: I forgot a couple things Lube - salty britches and a glide stick Salt pills My shoes are Hoka Challengers Socks are Feetures Merino 10s Ice bandana Sun screen As always, not sponsored. Just what I use currently. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #Moab240
item.description: I forgot a couple things Lube - salty britches and a glide stick Salt pills My shoes are Hoka Challengers Socks are Feetures Merino 10s Ice bandana Sun screen As always, not sponsored. Just what I use currently. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #Moab240

item.title: I'm heartbroken to share that I didn‚Äôt finish Moab again. Two attempts, two failures. I‚Äôm devastated and disappointed. This time, I ended up with heat stroke‚Äîstopped sweating, full body cramping, chest pain, severe dehydration, and went 20 hours without p

item.title: I'm sad. #Moab240 #runtok #dnf

item.title: I almost died attempting to run 240 miles. Let me take you through the experience. The race was going well, everything was going according to plan. I left the last aid station feeling good, with only one minor concern‚ÄîI hadn‚Äôt peed in a while. But I was d

item.title: Moab 240 miler warned me. I said the pledge. Glad I didn't die, though. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #Moab240 #Ultrarunner #Ultramarathon #runtok

item.title: A moment I'll never forget. Having these Battalion Chief bugles pinned on by my better half - the woman who has been my rock. No accomplishment means anything without you by my side. From probationary firefighter to Battalion Chief, this path has been bui
item.description: A moment I'll never forget. Having these Battalion Chief bugles pinned on by my better half - the woman who has been my rock. No accomplishment means anything without you by my side. From probationary firefighter to Battalion Chief, this path has been bui

item.title: A mustache can start conversations that save lives. üßî This Movember isn't just about growing facial hair ‚Äì it's about growing awareness. Prostate cancer is the #1 cancer risk for firefighters, but here's the hope: caught early, it's highly treatable. Talk

item.title: NYC Marathon ‚úÖÔ∏è Congratulations to Lauren on her marathon PR That was hard. Beautiful weather, electric spectators, wonderful volunteers, perfect organization. So much fun in 26 miles. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #NYCMarathon #runtok
item.description: NYC Marathon ‚úÖÔ∏è Congratulations to Lauren on her marathon PR That was hard. Beautiful weather, electric spectators, wonderful volunteers, perfect organization. So much fun in 26 miles. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #NYCMarathon #runtok

item.title: Winter runs often mean logging miles in the dark, making a reliable headlamp essential. I rely on the Petzl Iko Core, a headlamp that combines impressive specs with practical features. Not sponsored, just what I use. **Brightness and Modes:** The Iko Core
item.description: Winter runs often mean logging miles in the dark, making a reliable headlamp essential. I rely on the Petzl Iko Core, a headlamp that combines impressive specs with practical features. Not sponsored, just what I use. **Brightness and Modes:** The Iko Core

item.title: I am not sponsored. This is just what I use. I bought this light for full price without a discount and have no relationship with Ultraspire. Running ultramarathons at night, especially on rugged trails, demands optimal visibility without added fatigue. T
item.description: I am not sponsored. This is just what I use. I bought this light for full price without a discount and have no relationship with Ultraspire. Running ultramarathons at night, especially on rugged trails, demands optimal visibility without added fatigue. T

item.title: The loudest mayday call is often the one that's never spoken. Today, I'm speaking it for all of us. Whether you wear a badge or not, this message is for you. Pain doesn't discriminate between uniforms and civilian clothes. Neither should help. FOR EVERYON
item.description: The loudest mayday call is often the one that's never spoken. Today, I'm speaking it for all of us. Whether you wear a badge or not, this message is for you. Pain doesn't discriminate between uniforms and civilian clothes. Neither should help. FOR EVERYON

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
